entry.string: Write this string in the message body or subject to display the corresponding information
This email will be sent to users to complete their registration by a link in the email
This email will be sent to users to welcome them
This email will be sent to users who use the lost password option
This email will be sent to users when their accounts are pending approval
This email will be sent to users when their accounts are deactivated
The following variables will be replaced in the text with specific information
Send mail to groups, configure automatic notification or edit notification templates
There is an error in the username
There is a space in the username
That email address is already registered.
There is an error in the email address
The two password entries are not the same
The group #(1) is the default group for new users. If you want to remove it change the appropriate configuration setting first.
A new user has registered. Here are the details
That email address is either reserved or not allowed on this website
Your password must be #(1) characters long.
Show logout box when logged in
